title: Battle
description: Here you’ll battle against a trainer with 6 Pokémons. The level of the opponent’s Pokémon will be set according to that of your own.

title: Tent
description: You’ll be provided with 6 Pokéballs, each contains a mystery Pokémon. You’ll need to choose 3, the rest will belong to your opponent.

title: Tower
description: There are several trainers in the tower. Beat all of them to win the grand prize. You’ll also be rewarded as you clear different stages of the tower.
